description: You’ll be ready for whatever the mountain throws your way when you suit up in the Men’s GORE-TEX® KT Component Jacket. It comes with a waterproof, breathable shell and a liner jacket packed with 80 grams of ThermalR synthetic insulation. Wear them together over your baselayer when riding the resort on cold days, and if it warms up while riding you can shed the mid-layer and stay cool. When the temps drop at night, rock the ThermalR insulator jacket solo to your dinner reservation in the resort village.
name: Marmot KT GTX Component Jacket - Mens

specs.value: GORE-TEX Products® 100% Recycled Polyester Plain weave
